name.baseName: Natural gas ; Coal bed methane ; Drainage and pressure reduction desorption ; All sizes; NESPS2
天然气 ; 煤层气 ; 排水降压解析 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisCoagulation and flocculation + advanced oxidation + biological activated carbon filtration，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management65，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = actual operating hours of environmental protection facilities (hours) / hours that environmental protection facilities should operate (hours)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisCoagulation and flocculation + advanced oxidation + biological activated carbon filtration，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management65，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = actual operating hours of environmental protection facilities (hours) / hours that environmental protection facilities should operate (hours)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所提供的数据集描述了用于处理天然气和煤层气开采过程中污染的各种管端管理技术。这些技术适用于工业部门中的化学需氧量、氨氮、有机氮、石油相关废物和废水的处理。技术包括物理、化学处理方法、回注、先进氧化、絮凝与固液分离、断点氯化、使用BAF曝气过滤器的生化过滤，以及生物活性炭过滤。它们旨在管理并减少污染物，以满足环境标准，并且与环境保护和污染控制设施（特别是化学和石化工业）相关。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码07文件，在完整版文件中第80页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysical + chemical + reinjection，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management100，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = actual operating hours of environmental protection facilities (hours) / hours that environmental protection facilities should operate (hours)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是物理+化学+回注，其效率为100，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施年运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
